#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,b[33],i,c=0,s=0;
	cin>>n;
	while(n!=0)
	{
		b[c++]=n%2;
		n=n/2;
	}
//	cout<<c<<endl;
	if(c%2!=0)
	b[c]=0;
	else
	c--;
/*	for(i=c;i>=0;i--)
	cout<<b[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;*/
	for(i=0;i<=c;i+=2)
	{
		swap(b[i],b[i+1]);
		
	}
	/*	for(i=c;i>=0;i--)
	cout<<b[i]<<" ";*/
	for(i=0;i<=c;i++)
	{
		s+=pow(2,i)*b[i];
	}
	cout<<s<<endl;
}
